Comments_List: Great development of my German speaking and writing abilities

I really enjoyed the way this course was taught. I improved my practical German skills and learned (and re-learned) a lot of grammar. I also learned about German culture, especially because of the way our textbook was set up.

I think the course uses a variety of methods quite well, including conversation, video, worksheets etc. I also liked how we had very frequent exams which made them much less stressful and easier to study for. I think one major improvement would be to have vocabulary lists. I think learning vocabulary more systematically would've expanded my knowledge of the language more dramatically than trying to learn it organically. And although this method makes me internalize the words more, I still find myself needing words that don't know when I am trying to speak.
I think this is a very well organized and fun language course. Definitely worth taking if you know some/have been taking German.
